dublin_core.dcvalue: Developed by WHO s Department of Reproductive Health and Research in partnership with the United Nations Foundation and the Johns Hopkins University Global mHealth Initiative the mHealth Assessment and Planning for Scale MAPS Toolkit is a self assessment tool designed to assist project teams in scaling up their mHealth innovations The MAPS Toolkit aims to assist mHealth project teams to systematically assess their implementation as they transition from piloting to planning next steps Informed primarily through the Innovation Work Group s IWG mHealth Catalytic Grant Mechanism the Toolkit harnesses the experiences gathered from the collection of these pioneering projects to address the diverse set of considerations inherent in scaling up and striving for sustainability Please download and begin using your copy of the MAPS Toolkit here http bit ly MAPS form
mHealth Assessment and Planning for Scale (MAPS) Toolkit
mHealth Assessment and Planning for Scale (MAPS) Toolkit
